title: Why can't I login?!?!  Rito pls!
body:
Hey everyone,

I wanted to provide everyone an update to the Login Issues we have been experiencing today.  At around 2am, a nationwide ISP backbone provider experienced issues causing players to have issues logging in and connecting to League of Legends.  While many of these issues have been resolved, we are still seeing players having issues logging in successfully.  We are working with this provider to ensure that this issue gets fully resolved while we investigate things on our side to cover all of our bases.

I know these issues have sucked, but we are working non-stop to ensure that everyone can login normally!

For the latest updates, make sure to check the Server Status Page!

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na

replies.body: Obligatory joke about Rito forgetting to pay the internet bill.
Try using the .admin.exe that seemed to work for me although I'm afraid to log out and try again now...
CONFIRMED using the .admin.exe for me logged me in, the admin.exe is in the same folder as where the regular launcher is
Any clue on what exactly happened?
Our Network Engineers and Network Operations guys probably have pretty in-depth knowledge on what happened.  However, I don't have any of this in-depth understanding myself :(
Any chance they can be dragged away for an explanation?
